advie_add_metal: Build sprawlers on top of ore spots, to support more harvesting units
advice_add_energy: Increase energy production by building Power Plants
advice_expand_both: Build Metal Extractors and Power Plants
resbar_metal_income_tooltip:
Your metal income.
Gained from harvesting builders, metal makers and reclaim.
resbar_energy_income_tooltip:
Your energy income.
Gained from power plants, solars and fusions.
resbar_metal_bar_tooltip:
Represents your metal storage capacity. Filled portion is used storage.
Flashes if maximum storage is reached and you start wasting metal.
resbar_energy_bar_tooltip:
Represents your energy storage capacity. Filled portion is used storage.
Flashes if maximum storage is reached and you start wasting energy.
resbar_metal_expense_tooltip: Your metal demand. Construction and morph demands metal.
resbar_energy_expense_tooltip: This is this total energy demand of your production, units and abilities which require energy upkeep.
metal_excess_warning: Build more FARCs/Outposts to spend your metal.
energy_stall_warning: Build more solar plants or wind generators to prevent energy stall.
